summary: THE "SERVICE ENGINE SOON LIGHT" COMES ON ABOUT ONCE A MONTH.  MY AUTOMOBILE MECHANIC HAS TURNED OFF THE LIGHT EACH TIME.  HE SAYS THAT THE CATALYTIC CONVERTER IS EITHER WEAKENING OR THEIR IS A DEFECT IN THE LIGHT.  I FIND IT ALARMING ESPECIALLY WHEN I'M DRIVING AND I WORRY ABOUT IT EACH TIME IT COMES ON.
